text: Chase Russell Oliver (born August 16, 1985) is an American political activist, sales account executive, and HR representative. He is the Libertarian Partyâ€™s nominee in the 2024 United States presidential election. Oliver was the Libertarian nominee for the 2022 United States Senate election in Georgia and the 2020 Georgia's 5th congressional district special election. In the 2022 Georgia special United States Senate election, Oliver received over 2% of the popular vote, possibly acting as a spoiler candidate and forcing the Georgia senate race into a run-off. Oliver is openly gay and resides in the suburbs of Atlanta.Boehm, Eric (November 18, 2022) "What's Next for Chase Oliver, the Libertarian Who Forced a Runoff in the Georgia Senate Race?", Reason.com. Retrieved December 9, 2002. In April 2023, Oliver announced his candidacy for President of the United States in the 2024 election. == References == Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:2024 United States presidential candidates Category:Libertarian Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Nashville, Tennessee Category:Politicians from Atlanta Category:Businesspeople from Nashville, Tennessee Category:Businesspeople from Atlanta Category:American political activists Category:Gay men Category:LGBT politicians Category:LGBT businesspeople Category:LGBT people from Tennessee Category:LGBT people from Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Chase Oliver
